name: Miracle Whip Chocolate Cake
author: Karla Essner
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Stir in Miracle Whip with a spoon. Stir in hot water. Stir in vanilla. Spray 13 x 9 inch pan with nonstick cooking spray. Pour batter into pan. Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes. If desired, recipe makes 36 cupcakes. Spoon 2 tablespoons batter in each baking cup. Bake at 350° for 20 minutes.
